imgDesc.text: In Subzero Climate, you will continuously accumulate Sheer Cold. When Sheer Cold reaches its limit, your character will <color=#ffe14b>start rapidly losing HP</color> . Apart from that, due to Dragonspine's unique Ley Line structure and climate, you may be <color=#ffe14b>unable to use</color> some gadgets.

Bonfires and other sources of heat will <color=#ffe14b>diminish Sheer Cold</color> .
There might be also special items that lessen the effects of Sheer Cold.

Certain conditions like Snowstorms and actions like swimming will accelerate Sheer Cold's accumulation.
Carefully plan your route ahead of time to make sure you'll survive a trip through Subzero Climate.
